text: There are 2 start and 2 end date fields that are required to be filled out. Is it possible to add a validation so that the Sample Collection Start and End Dates are not outside of the Project Start and End Dates while creating deal ?

Hi Everyone, I am running into the attached import error as I try to import my website into HubSpot.

My question is would anyone know how to troubleshoot or have seen a blog post on how to fix?

Asking because the 'learn more' link that is given to me below only takes me here on how to import pages which is redundant: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/blog/import-your-content-into-HubSpot>
FYI our website is being updated so if anyone can confirm if that would be the primary issue, that would be great too.
